snippet.title: CRIMSON TALE | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3485290/Crimson_Tale/

Crimson Tale is a short first-person narrative puzzle game where Elizabeth takes one last action against the oppressing forces of the nobility. Avoid the sun, go back in time with blood magic and use your vampire abilities to find the golden guard, ending this tyrany once and for all.
